## Paginator.getPagesWithTrimDispersion() method

Gets list of page numbers with specified dispersion, pages are trimmed if current page is near beginning or end

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPagesWithTrimDispersion(dispersion: number): number[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dispersion | <code>number</code> | Number identifying dispersion |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number[]`

number Page numbers according specified dispersion
